attributes.action: Bank holiday for 12th July 2020, the day after England's first final since 1966.
attributes.additional_details: Being able to celebrate this rare occasion would be an amazing opportunity for the whole population after such a dire year locked into our homes away from our friends and family.
attributes.background: We want to arrange an 'emergency' bank holiday for Monday the 12th of July, to celebrate England getting to the final of the Euro 2020 competition, the first major final since 1966.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Bank Holiday Monday if England get to the finals of the Euro’s 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590584

Give the UK a Bank Holiday on Monday July 12th if England win Euro 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590282
